title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Cannot open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor (should give error message)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Cannot open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor (should give error message)
OB: When a file is opened in a particular editor, and user tries to open the same file in another editor by right-clicking on it and choosing 'Open With .. System Editor', nothing happens. There should be a warning message displayed in the workbench, indicating that the user may overwrite any changes made in the file and asking if they want to continue. Alternatively, an error message should be displayed, stating that all files need to be closed first. Currently, no warning or error message is shown.
EB: However, a warning message should be displayed in the workbench when attempting to open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in the workbench
2. Right-click on the same file
3. Choose 'Open With .. System Editor'
4. Verify that no warning or error message is displayed

Expected: A warning message should be displayed in the workbench
